text: Nowacho niya, “Wuod dhano, ma en kama kom duongʼ mara nitie, kendo en e raten mar tienda. Ma e kama abiro dakie e dier jo-Israel nyaka chiengʼ. Jo-dhood Israel, ruodhigi kaachiel gi ogandani duto ok nochak okel wichkuot ni nyinga maler kendo kuom timbegi mag chode, kod nyiseche motho mag ruodhi mag-gi manie kuonde motingʼore mag-gi.
